name: #60 The Prince of Light
description:
It was then that the Prince, with his wisdom of light that, though lesser than that of the King, was deep and strong, summoned lightning at his fingertips.

The light was brief, but it managed to turn the tables. The creatures, confused and temporarily blinded, stumbled clumsily as the Watchers pushed forward and, soon enough, the creatures had all fallen. All hail, the Prince of Light. The future of the Eyeverse.

[Season 1, Chapter 7 - In the Battle](https://eyeverse.world/chapter-7)
